# Research-Related Work and Consulting

## Research leadership and coordination

```{r consulting_leadership, include = TRUE, eval=TRUE}
leadership_data <- rbind(
    tibble(
        what = "President and Co-Founder -- nQuerio",
        URL = "",
        when = "2022/9 - present",
        with = "nQuerio (research software for researchers)",
        where = "Montreal, QC, Canada",
        details = c(
            "Co-founded and lead the development of nQuerio, a research software platform designed by and for academic researchers.",
            "Collaborate with research teams around the world (e.g., Australian Catholic University, Columbia University, McGill University, UQAM, UQTR) to provide statistical and methodological consulting, data security and handling solutions, research logistics and technology support, and tools aligned with open science practices."
        )
    ),
    tibble(
        what = "Research Laboratory Coordinator",
        URL = "",
        when = "2022 - 2024/12",
        with = "Vitrai, UQAM, Université du Québec à Montréal",
        where = "Montreal",
        details = c("Research Laboratory Coordinator")
    )
)

detailed_entries(leadership_data, with, when, what, where, details, .protect = FALSE)
```

## Research consulting

```{r consulting_roles, include = TRUE, eval=TRUE}
consulting_data <- rbind(
    tibble(
        what = "Statistical Consultant -- Department of Psychology",
        URL = "",
        when = "2024 - 2025",
        with = "Université du Québec à Montréal (UQAM)",
        where = "Montreal, QC, Canada",
        details = c("Provided advanced quantitative consulting for multiple labs in work/organizational, educational, and developmental psychology: study design and power analysis, open science practices, large database management, advanced data analysis (SEM, longitudinal and multilevel models, etc.), R support, and guidance on writing Method and Results sections.")
    ),
    tibble(
        what = "Statistical Consultant -- Departments of Education and Physical Activity Sciences",
        URL = "",
        when = "2024 - 2025",
        with = "Université du Québec à Trois-Rivières (UQTR)",
        where = "Trois-Rivières, QC, Canada",
        details = c("Statistical consulting for research teams in education and physical activity sciences: study design, power analysis, data management, advanced modeling (e.g., SEM, multilevel and longitudinal models), and support in interpreting and reporting quantitative results.")
    ),
    tibble(
        what = "Survey Methods Consultant -- Faculty of Human Sciences",
```

## Research assistantships

```{r research_assistantships, include = TRUE, eval=TRUE}

        what = "Research Assistant -- Organizational Behavior Research Laboratory",
        URL = "",
        when = "2017/09 - 2018/09; 2021/03 - 2021/05",
        with = "Department of Psychology, Université du Québec à Montréal (UQAM)",
        where = "Montreal, QC, Canada",
        details = c("Research assistant in Professor Nathalie Houlfort's lab on work and organizational psychology projects (e.g., survey preparation, data collection and management, preliminary quantitative analyses).")
    ),
    tibble(
        what = "Research Assistant -- Social Behavior Research Laboratory",

        with = "Department of Psychology, Université du Québec à Montréal (UQAM)",
```
